remarks: The join and meet of any two elements exist.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2018.)
statement:
latcl2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latcl2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latcl2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latcl2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Lat ) $.
latcl2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
latcl2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
latcl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ /\ <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ ) ) $.
